Module com.jlbabilino.json
Package com.jlbabilino.json

Class JSONBoolean

java.lang.Object
com.jlbabilino.json.JSONEntry
com.jlbabilino.json.JSONBoolean
public class JSONBoolean extends JSONEntry
This class wraps a boolean value in a JSONEntry.
See Also:
JSONEntry, JSONNumber, JSONString

    • toJSONText

      public String toJSONText​(int indentLevel, int jsonFormat)
      Generates a String that represents this JSON boolean. If this entry contains a true value, then returns "true", otherwise returns "false". It is equivalent to 
       Boolean.toString(getBoolean())
      Specified by:
      toJSONText in class JSONEntry
      Parameters:
      indentLevel - this parameter has no effect on the result or effect of this implementation of this method
      jsonFormat - this parameter has no effect on the result or effect of this implementation of this method
      Returns:
      a String representing this JSON boolean
